name: Ms. Petman
description:
It is a top down "dual direction" shooter where your gun is a cat. You can feed it, dote it, talk to it, and itch it to increase it's happiness. The happier the cat is, the more you do damage!

It was a game of a larger scope until continuous troubles with the game engine led to me cutting it down more and more until this was left. On top of that, after this got submitted I went to make a newer version in that had music and touched up a few areas but then Clickteam Fusion somehow corrupted the game... Maybe? Maybe something got accidentaly clicked but certain layers in the game no longer render and Fissurefury and I don't know what is going on.

Update: Figured out the issue and fixed the bug.

So yeah, it's pretty rough. But I'm still very happy with myself that I saw to it and finished the game on time. You can die, you can win, you can dote a cat.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move.

Mouse to aim and shoot.

Tab opens pet menu.

Esc quits.
